feature.label: Slice2Java Eclipse Plugin
feature.description: The slice2java plugin manages the translation of Slice to Java. The plugin computes dependencies between Slice files and automatically recompiles Slice files when necessary. The plugin also manages the generated code to eliminate obsolete files.
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2003-2010 ZeroC, Inc. All rights reserved This copy of the slice2java eclipse plugin is licensed to you under the terms described in the license agreement attached to this distribution.
